problem.title: Cross-Domain: Work and Line Integrals
problem.question: A force field F = (2xy, x²) acts on a particle moving along the path C from (0,0) to (1,1), where C is the curve y = x². Calculate the work done.
solution_outline: 1. Parameterize the curve: x = t, y = t², where t ∈ [0,1]
3. Substitute into F: F(t) = (2t·t², t²) = (2t³, t²)
4. Compute F·dr = 2t³·dt + t²·2t·dt = 2t³ dt + 2t³ dt = 4t³ dt
